results.title: Left ventricular end-diastolic dimensions measured at the P wave and Q wave during a randomized, double-blind one-year follow-up study comparing the effect of atenolol vs. hydrochlorothiazide + amiloride on blood pressure in men with mild to moderate hypertension.
results.text_hl: With similar effect on @<m>DISEASE_Megalencephalic_leukoencephalopathy_with_subcortical_cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536141 @@@LVM@@@, the mechanisms in reducing @<m>DISEASE_Megalencephalic_leukoencephalopathy_with_subcortical_cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536141 @@@LVM@@@ were different between the two drugs.

citations.NLM: Otterstad JE, Froeland G, Erikssen J. Left ventricular end-diastolic dimensions measured at the P wave and Q wave during a randomized, double-blind one-year follow-up study comparing the effect of atenolol vs. hydrochlorothiazide + amiloride on blood pressure in men with mild to moderate hypertension. Scand J Clin Lab Invest. 1993 Apr;53(2):155-62. PMID: 8469914

results.title: Four-group classification of left ventricular hypertrophy based on ventricular concentricity and dilatation identifies a low-risk subset of eccentric hypertrophy in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: In the @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@Losartan@@@ Intervention for Endpoint Reduction (LIFE) echocardiography substudy, 939 @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with measurable @<m>DISEASE_Megalencephalic_leukoencephalopathy_with_subcortical_cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536141 @@@LVM@@@ at baseline were randomized to a mean of 4.8 years of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@- or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-based treatment.

citations.NLM: Bang CN, Gerdts E, Aurigemma GP, Boman K, de Simone G, Dahlöf B, Køber L, Wachtell K, Devereux RB. Four-group classification of left ventricular hypertrophy based on ventricular concentricity and dilatation identifies a low-risk subset of eccentric hypertrophy in hypertensive patients. Circ Cardiovasc Imaging. 2014 May;7(3):422-9. PMID: 24723582
